MainItem.Title: Lt.

Rel. commn. on completion of service, arid retains rank of Lt Allton, Lt. F. W. (rel. commn., and retains rank of Lt.) ... .Alltree, temp. Capt. S. (rel. commn. on completion of service, and retains rank of Capt.)
